text: Augments strengthen the caster’s friends and allies over an area, enhancing their battlefield prowess.
Enhances the flow of Winds of Magic in favour of yours or allies' spellcasters.
A devastating area of Direct Damage attacks.
An area of Hexes weaken the enemy, making them easier to slay.
Rejuvenating essence flows back into friends and allies over an area, healing and sometimes resurrecting.
An area of Ward Saves prevent certain types of damage from affecting their bearers.
Weakens or removes Ward Saves applied to their bearers over an area.
Augments strengthen the caster’s friends and allies, enhancing their battlefield prowess.
Enhances the flow of Winds of Magic in favour of yours or allies' spellcasters.
A Bombardment rains down missiles from the sky directly above the target.
When directed at the enemy, Breath chokes them with noxious fumes or incinerates their flesh.
This augment jumps from a nearby enemy unit to another, up to a limit.
This direct damage effect spreads from nearby enemy unit to another, up to a limit.
This hex jumps from a nearby enemy unit to another, up to a limit.
This regeneration effect jumps from a nearby friendly unit to another, up to a limit.
Direct Damage spells are deadly attacks that devastate their targets.
Explosions cause damage that radiates outwards from their source in all directions.
Unit formations focuses them on a singular goal.
Hexes weaken the enemy, making them easier to slay.
Obstructs the Winds of Magic's flow for enemy spellcasters.
Units can hide away from the sight and mind of their foes.
A singular Magic Missile hurled directly at the foe.
Magic Missiles are sorcerous projectiles that spellcasters hurl directly at their foes.
Rejuvenating essence flows back into friends and allies, healing and sometimes resurrecting.
Spawns a unit to join the battle.
Transformations are a way for units to change their current form.
A roiling, deadly Vortex steadily damages foes and wrenches them from their ranks.
A type of arcane resilience, Ward Saves prevent certain types of damage from affecting their bearers.
Weakens or removes Ward Saves applied to their bearers.
An irresistible gust drives through all that lies in its path.
